product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Cheesy Noodle Casserole with Sugar Snap Peas - Single Serving
long_description: This wholesome meal featuring sharp cheddar cheese and sugar snap peas is guaranteed to please your palate! A vegetarian dish made with all-natural, organic ingredients. Can be prepared in its own pouch; just add boiling water, stir and let stand before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
